title-group.article-title: Estimate of IC Engine Torque from Measurement of Crankshaft Angular Position

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1994 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: Crankshaft angular position measurement are fundamental to all modern automotive engines. These measurements are required to control fuel injection timing as well as ignition timing. However, many other functions can be performed form such mesurements through the use of advanced signal prosessing These additional functions are essentially diagnostion of primary fuel and ignition control function. This paper illustratcs the application of crankshaft angular position measurement to the estimation of individuual cylinder indicated and/or brake lorque in IC engines form measurement of crankshaft position/velocity
